## QueryStateConfig.ignore property

A decider function that decides whether to invoke the query By default all changes are sent to the query If the function returns `true`<!-- -->, the changes are ignored and the query isn't invoked

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ignore?: (params: {
        params: DataParams;
        queryParams: DataParams;
    }) => boolean;
```
